nodeList.loreText: Look into the orb, watch closely. It's looking back at you too.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Creates a devouring orb at the target location that casts a void rift whenever something dies nearby, dealing void damage to enemies around the orb. Each successive rift has 12% increased damage and area of effect, capped at an increase of 100%. Devouring orbs last 10 seconds.

nodeList.description: Devouring Orb orbits you at a greater distance.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Devouring orb orbits at a [50%] greater distance per point

node.description: Devouring Orb now orbits you, but {Void Rifts} deal less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) in a smaller area and Devouring Orb costs significantly more mana.
node.nodeDescription: 300% increased mana cost. 50% reduced damage and area growth on kill. Devouring orb orbits you.

nodeList.altText: {Abyssal Orb} is a spell which seeks enemies and detonates, dealing void damage in an area.
nodeList.description: Devouring Orb casts {Abyssal Orb} more frequently.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The devouring orb emits abyssal orbs [30%] more frequently per point

node.altText: Abyssal Orbs scale with increases to void damage and spell damage.
node.description: Every 3 seconds Devouring Orb releases an {Abyssal Orb}, a spell which seeks enemies and detonates, dealing void damage in an area.
node.nodeDescription: Every 3 seconds the devouring orb releases an abyssal orb, which seeks a nearby enemy before detonating to deal void damage.\n\nAbyssal orbs scales with increases to void damage and spell damage.

nodeList.description: Devouring Orb costs less mana, but has a shorter duration.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [35%] increased mana efficiency per point. Devouring orb has [13%] reduced duration per point.

node.altText:
Void Rifts from Void Eruption are not affected by Void Rift nodes within this tree.
An enemy cannot be hit by more than one Void Rift from a single Void Eruption.
node.description:
Devouring Orb now erupts at the end of its duration, creating multiple {Void Rifts} in a wide area.

Devouring Orb has a shorter duration.
node.nodeDescription: Your devouring orbs have 40% reduced duration, but erupt at the end of their duration, launching void orbs in every direction.\n\nVoid orbs scale with increases to void damage and spell damage. The damage increase from Void Adept always applies to void orbs.
